code: @Override protected XContentBuilder doXContentBody(XContentBuilder builder, Params params) throws IOException {     // InternalWeightedAvg renders value only if the avg normalizer (count) is not 0.     // We parse back `null` as Double.POSITIVE_INFINITY so we check for that value here to get the same xContent output     boolean hasValue = value != Double.POSITIVE_INFINITY.     builder.field(CommonFields.VALUE.getPreferredName(), hasValue ? value : null).     if (hasValue && valueAsString != null) {         builder.field(CommonFields.VALUE_AS_STRING.getPreferredName(), valueAsString).     }     return builder. }
public static ParsedWeightedAvg fromXContent(XContentParser parser, final String name) {     ParsedWeightedAvg avg = PARSER.apply(parser, null).     avg.setName(name).     return avg. }
